name: D&Dice (Pixel Bee)
description:
D&Dice is a Game Where you play as a magic die that has to fight off playing cards. the twist is every 15 seconds, the die Re-Rolls to a Random Number, and each number has a different Power. the player has to change their strategy on the fly to continue to play.

~~~~~~Controls~~~~~~~~~~

Arrow Keys to Move

Space to Use Ability

Mouse to Aim  (If the current ability needs it)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This was Made as a Submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2022. The Power Re-Rolls are what make this Game Fit the Theme.
